items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Super Sexy Dress!!
items.body: This little blue dress is so sexy!! I love the blue color, not too dark or bright which makes it suitable for many different events. This could be worn as a date night dress, for a cocktail party, or club dancing with girlfriends. The fabric is soft, strechable, and strong with ruching on the sides. And it ties around the neck. No zipper, but it slides on easily. (I ordered a larger size and glad I did. So suggest going one size up, so it's not too too tight.) And love the ruching (gathered fabric) on the sides. A little ruching on a dress kind of camoflauges areas like around the waist and stomach areas. Overall, this dress will definitely command lots of attention when you enter a room. Read more
items.author: jabbergirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Date night worthy!
items.body: This dress takes me out of my comfort zone in a good way. The material is light and soft to touch. The dress isn’t too short to be revealing and has some stretch to it for a comfy fit. Read more
items.author: Mack Fam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE!
items.body: So pleasantly surprised by this dress! I was shocked by the quality. The thickness of the material is enough to not necessarily have to wear undergarments, and even though I'm short (5'3"), the length works great on me (usually things are too long on me). I actually like the top better just tying it in the back without the criss-cross in the front (I felt like there was a bit too much material in the front, but it is probably due to my short torso). But it's nice that it's interchangeable! I love the white, I love the rouching on the side, and the open back is flattering. This was a huge win and I'm taking it on vacay this month! True to size - this is size small and I'm 5'3", 115 lbs. Highly recommend!! Read more
items.author: Josh or Candace

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprised and pleased
items.body: My first thoughts was this is very much a dress from SHEIN. However, once I unpacked and tried it on, I am very surprised and pleased. No pics of me in it as I’m still not at that level of confidence, but I will say, that I do feel very good in this dress. You can wear the top as seen in the pic or more as a halter, I prefer the way it’s advertised though. I really like the feel of the material, it’s soft and breathable. I’m glad I ordered a size up, normally I’d be a medium (8/10) but I decided to go with a large and it fits perfectly. I also appreciate the length, a couple inches above the knee but not too short to risk showing my booty. I did add a pic of how it came packed, be very careful opening this, as cutting the dress could happen very easily. No weird smells or anything. Read more
items.author: s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute
items.body: This dress is super flattering and fits just right in a size small. The ruched detailing and criss cross back give it a sexy but classy vibe, perfect for a night out. The fabric feels comfortable and stretchy, and the Chanterelle color looks even better in person. Definitely a confidence booster and a great party dress. Read more
items.author: AmazonAddict

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bland dress but great see thru fir
items.body: Very plain and just dull and boring looking. It is kinda see thru and very thin material it stretches well but it gets even more see theu the fit is fine but a bit just bland Read more
items.author: Angelique

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This dress doesn't feel as sexy as it looks
items.body: Definitely overpriced. Material is not what I expected this dress to be made of. It's true to size, medium. The dress stretches pretty good. But for someone who lives in Florida, this is a casual everyday dress. I took a star off for the material for 2 reasons. The material seems to be of a faded black color. But that could be because it gives polyester/cotton material vibes. And those materials tend to give an off/faded black coloring. Not like a spandex etc type of vibe. It felt soft and comfortable on. But I wouldn't wear this to the club. Around here, even to my hubby, this is a regular casual dress. Best thing you could criss cross the tie part or wear it like I have it. Either way, didn't make me feel no more sexier than the other. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Little Black Dress
items.body: This is a very sexy dress. It is ruched along the seams down the sides. The top piece is a tie so its adjustable for preference and the straps are definitely long enough. The material is soft and stretchy because its 75% polyester and 25% spandex. There are some deep wrinkles in the dress (hardly noticeable) from being vacuum sealed. I'm hopeful those will come out after a wash. Overall a great dress, as pictured, and good value for the cost. Read more
items.author: Pita

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Ruched Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Ruched Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Watermelon, Brilliant White, Bellwether Blue, Black Onyx, Chanterelle. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
